item.title: Histograms in RStudio
item.description: In this section we will work with the Lahman database to create a histogram with ggplot2. First let’s load some packages. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) We create a data frame with dplyr where we filter out the NA’s and only select the weight on the players. df<-Master%>% filter(!is.na(weight))%>% select(weight) head(df) ## weight ## 1 215 ## 2 180 ## 3 190 ## 4 190 ## 5 184 ## 6 220 Now we create a histogram in ggplot using the following code:
